price: Mwenyezi Mungu - hapana mungu ila Yeye, Mola Mlezi wa A'rshi tukufu
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu, ambaye hapana wa kuabudiwa kwa Haki isipo kuwa Yeye, ndiye Mwenye madaraka makuu yasio na ukomo juu ya kila kiumbe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
